DataElement.preferredDefinition: The sum of the predictive index values assigned to the inclusion criteria that make up the Fagotti score.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A laparoscopy-based score to predict the chances of optimal cytoreductive surgery in advanced ovarian cancer patients. It consists of seven criteria (omental cake, peritoneal carcinosis, diaphragmatic carcinosis, mesenteric retraction, bowel infiltration, stomach infiltration, and liver metastases), each assigned a predictive index value of 0-2. The total Fagotti score ranges from 0-14._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A laparoscopy-based score to predict the chances of optimal cytoreductive surgery in advanced ovarian cancer patients. It consists of seven criteria (omental cake, peritoneal carcinosis, diaphragmatic carcinosis, mesenteric retraction, bowel infiltration, stomach infiltration, and liver metastases), each assigned a predictive index value of 0-2. The total Fagotti score ranges from 0-14.

Concepts.definition: A laparoscopy-based score to predict the chances of optimal cytoreductive surgery in advanced ovarian cancer patients. It consists of seven criteria (omental cake, peritoneal carcinosis, diaphragmatic carcinosis, mesenteric retraction, bowel infiltration, stomach infiltration, and liver metastases), each assigned a predictive index value of 0-2. The total Fagotti score ranges from 0-14.
